[A] - When a Climax is placed in your Climax Zone, choose one of your Characters, during this turn, it gains the following effect:
-[A] - When this card attacks, look at up to two cards from the top of your Deck, choose one card among them, place it on top of Deck, send the remaining cards to Waiting Room.
[S] - BRAINSTORM [(1) REST this card] Flip the top four cards of your Deck, send them to Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, choose up to one Character in your Waiting Room, add it to Hand.

[A] - When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may send the top card of your Clock to Waiting Room.
[A] - CX COMBO [Send one card from Hand to Waiting Room] When this card attacks, if you have [大胆な答え合わせ] in your Climax Zone, if you have two or more other《Quintuplets》Characters, you may pay the cost. If you did, during this turn, this card gains the following effect:
-[A] - This effect activates up to once per turn. When this card's dealt damage is canceled, choose up to X cards in your opponent's Waiting Room, return them to Deck, your opponent shuffles their Deck afterwards, deal X damage to your opponent. X is the number of your other《Quintuplets》Characters. (Damage can be canceled)

[A] - When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, if you have another Character with "Ichika" in their card name, look at up to two cards from the top of your Deck, place them on top of Deck in any order.
[A] - [Send one card from Hand to Waiting Room] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, reveal the top card of your Deck, choose one Level X or lower Character with "Ichika" in their card name in your Waiting Room, add it to Hand. X is the level of the revealed card. (Climax is considered Level 0. Return revealed card to its original position)

[A] - When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, send the top two cards of your Deck to Waiting Room, during this turn, this card gains +X Power. X is the number of Characters with "Yotsuba" in their card name or [転校の理由] among those cards x1000.
[A] - [(1) Send one card from Hand to Waiting Room, send this card to Memory] When this card is REVERSE, in battle, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose one Character with "Yotsuba" in their card name in your Waiting Room, add it to Hand.

[C] - RECOLLECTION During your turn, if you have a card in your Memory, this card gains +1500 Power.
[A] - [(1)] When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the cost. If you did, choose one cost 0 or lower Character with "Yotsuba" in their card name in your Waiting Room, place it on any slot on Stage, at the end of turn, send that Character to Memory.

[C] - During your turn, all of your other [不器用な恋心 中野 一花] gains +1000 power and the following effect:
-[A] - At the end of this card's attack, look at the top card of your Deck, place it on top of Deck or Waiting Room.
[C] - ASSIST All of your《Quintuplets》Characters in front of this card gains +X Power. X is that Character's Level x500.

If you did, choose up to one Climax with Choice Trigger Icon in your Waiting Room, add it to Hand, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a Character with "Ichika" in their card name, add it to Hand. (If not return card to its original position)
